ll powmod(ll a, ll b, ll mod)
{
    ll x=1,y=a;
    while(b>0)
    {
        if(b%2==1)
        {
            x=(x*y);
            if(x>mod) x%=mod;
        }
        y=y*y;
        if(y>mod) y%=mod;
        b/=2;
    }
    return x;

}



ll mmi(ll a,ll mod)
{
  return  powmod(a,mod-2,mod);
}
